p.k: During a book signing at a medieval castle, Ben must stop Hex from getting his hands on a grimoire that can fuse its user with mythical beasts – creating monstrous hybrids! / Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal to watch his favourite show "Xingo", but the titular Xingo leaps from his animated dimension to ours – bringing mad chaos with him! / After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they’ve stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred – an epic, off-road auto race. / When the Rust Bucket runs out of gas on a foggy, East Coast road, Ben, Gwen, and Max are forced to stay at hotel being menaced by Creepy Carl.
